doc.summary: As the fancy colored <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/NbtComponent">nbt components</ref> are only available for  <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/NbtComponent$BlockNbtComponent">blocks</ref>, <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/NbtComponent$EntityNbtComponent">entities</ref>  and <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/NbtComponent$StorageNbtComponent">world storage</ref> by default, this translates a piece of NBT  to a colored <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/Component">text component</ref>.
doc.text: As the fancy colored <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/NbtComponent">nbt components</ref> are only available for  <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/NbtComponent$BlockNbtComponent">blocks</ref>, <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/NbtComponent$EntityNbtComponent">entities</ref>  and <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/NbtComponent$StorageNbtComponent">world storage</ref> by default, this translates a piece of NBT  to a colored <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/Component">text component</ref>.

doc.summary: Translates <ref cls="net/minecraft/nbt/Tag">Named Binary Tag</ref> into <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/MutableComponent">text components</ref>.
doc.text: Translates <ref cls="net/minecraft/nbt/Tag">Named Binary Tag</ref> into <ref cls="net/minecraft/network/chat/MutableComponent">text components</ref>.
